Title: Django
Plot: Squelching across a God-forsaken ghost town near the US/Mexican border, always dragging a heavy coffin, blue-eyed Django, a drifting, mud-spattered, former Union soldier, saves runaway María from certain death. But, the wooden container with the mysterious content has already caught the attention of the racist ex-Confederate officer, Major Jackson, and his gang of white supremacists, and before long, things get nasty. Now, the guns have the final say, and as if that weren't enough, Jackson's sworn enemy, General Hugo Rodríguez, and his feared revolutionaries, enter the picture, wanting to have a piece of the action. Can Django, the taciturn stranger with the lighting-fast right hand, take on two armies of murderous henchmen, and live to tell the tale?
Writers: Sergio Corbucci, Bruno Corbucci, Franco Rossetti, Piero Vivarelli, Geoffrey Copleston, Fernando Di Leo, José Gutiérrez Maesso, Ryûzô Kikushima
Stars: Franco Nero, José Canalejas, José Bódalo, Loredana Nusciak

ActorList.Name: Rafael Albaicín
ActorList.AsCharacter: Member of Hugo's Gang (as Raphael Albaicin)

ActorList.Name: José Canalejas
ActorList.AsCharacter: Member of Hugo's Gang (as José Canalecas)

Tagline: He was pitiless in revenge, quick to decide, and a master of every weapon... a man everybody would liked to have seen dead!

Similars.Title: The Great Silence
Similars.Plot: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.
Similars.Stars: Jean-Louis Trintignant, Klaus Kinski, Frank Wolff

Similars.Title: The Mercenary
Similars.Plot: A greedy Polish mercenary aids a mine worker and peasant girl as they lead a revolution against the oppressive Mexican Government, and are pursued by an American rival.
Similars.Stars: Franco Nero, Tony Musante, Franco Giacobini

Similars.Title: Django Strikes Again
Similars.Plot: A monk returns to his former life as a gunfighter when his estranged daughter is kidnapped by a Hungarian slaver.
Similars.Stars: Franco Nero, Christopher Connelly, Licinia Lentini

Similars.Title: Keoma
Similars.Plot: A half-breed ex-Union gunfighter attempts to protect his plague-ridden hometown from being overridden by his racist half-brothers and a Confederate tyrant.
Similars.Stars: Franco Nero, William Berger, Olga Karlatos

Similars.Title: The Big Gundown
Similars.Plot: Unofficial lawman John Corbett hunts down Cuchillo Sanchez, a Mexican peasant accused of raping and killing a 12-year-old girl.
Similars.Stars: Lee Van Cleef, Tomas Milian, Walter Barnes

Similars.Title: Day of Anger
Similars.Plot: A scruffy garbage boy becomes the pupil of a famed gunfighter, and the stage for confrontation is set when the gunman becomes unhinged and overruns the boy's town through violence and corruption.
Similars.Stars: Lee Van Cleef, Giuliano Gemma, Walter Rilla

Similars.Title: Texas, Adios
Similars.Plot: A Texan sheriff and his younger brother travel across the border into Mexico to confront the man who killed their father.
Similars.Stars: Franco Nero, Alberto Dell'Acqua, Elisa Montés

Similars.Title: Duck, You Sucker!
Similars.Plot: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.
Similars.Stars: Rod Steiger, James Coburn, Romolo Valli

Similars.Title: Companeros
Similars.Plot: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.
Similars.Stars: Franco Nero, Tomas Milian, Fernando Rey

Similars.Title: Death Rides a Horse
Similars.Plot: A young gunfighter forms a tenuous alliance with an aging ex-outlaw to track down and eliminate the bandits who killed his family, till the surprising end.
Similars.Stars: Lee Van Cleef, John Phillip Law, Mario Brega

Similars.Title: A Bullet for the General
Similars.Plot: A band of Mexican gun-runners employed by a revolutionary general accept an American into their gang, unaware of his intentions.
Similars.Stars: Gian Maria Volontè, Klaus Kinski, Martine Beswick

Similars.Title: Django, Prepare a Coffin
Similars.Plot: A gunfighter forms a gang of "deceased" execution victims to get revenge on the politician and outlaw who killed his wife.
Similars.Stars: Terence Hill, Horst Frank, George Eastman
